job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Position: Data ScientistLocation: Atlanta, GA (remote)Job Description:A42 Labs is a rapidly growing AI and ML startup in Atlanta, GA. We work with closely with clients all over the United States to change the way they work with data and artificial intelligence.A42 Data Scientists work side-by-side our clients to build and deploy end-to-end artificial intelligence and machine learning solutions at scale.If you enjoy working on high impact and challenging data problems that deliver value to clients, then we would like to hear from you.Responsibilities:Design and develop algorithms and models to use against large datasetsApply data science techniques to diverse real-world problems on large and dynamic datasetsEnd-to-end data processing and modeling of large data setsWorking collaboratively with clients to develop and optimize models tailored to their dataCommunicate analysis and model results to clients stakeholders Educate technical and non-technical clients on analytics and data-driven decision making30% - 70% travel annuallyRequired Skills:2+ years Data Science experienceExperience building, training and testing machine learning modelsExperience with end-to-end data pipelining and modelingExperience with Python, R and/or SASExperience with Spark, Tensorflow, PyTorch type big data and ML/DL frameworksExperience with common visualization tools (e.g. Tableau, Qlikview)Capacity to quickly understand complex systemsWillingness to learn new technologies and an ability to effectively apply themStrong communication skillsBachelor's degree in related field e.g. Computer Science, Physics, Mathematics, EngineeringDesired Skills:Master and/or PHDPrevious consulting experienceExposure to the handling of large, diverse, real-world datasetsKnowledge of Spark, Greenplum and/or Hadoop Exposure to Lean, Agile and Extreme Development practicesExperience with deep learning tools and packages (e.g. Tensorflow, PyTorch)A42 Labs Offers:Competitive salaryPre IPO equityGreat health benefits3 weeks paid vacationApple laptopsStartup culture
